title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
directorNote: Our actors' comedic timing and the stunning set design brought this classic tale to life in a way we've never seen before. It was a truly collaborative effort.

title: Our Town
highlight: A powerful and moving performance that resonated with everyone.
directorNote: We stripped away the set to focus on the raw emotion of Wilder's script. The cast delivered a breathtakingly honest performance that left the audience in tears.

title: The Importance of Being Earnest
highlight: A hilarious comedy about mistaken identities!
directorNote: The witty dialogue and vibrant costumes made this a crowd favorite. Our actors perfectly captured the absurd charm of Oscar Wilde's masterpiece.
